description: Use this page to update your account password or delete your account. Deleting your account will remove resources in these accounts as well.
passwordFormat: Passwords must contain at least 8 characters uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol.

deleteAccountModal.deleteAccountHeader: Do you want to permanently delete you AWS Player account?
deleteAccountModal.deleteAccountDesc: Deleting your account cannot be undone. When you delete your account, you will lose access to other resources outside of DeepRacer on AWS.
deleteAccountModal.deleteAccountInputHeader: To confirm deletion, type Delete in the field.

changePasswordModal.passwordFormat: Your password can have up to 8 characters. Valid characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and . : + = @ _ %
changePasswordModal.successMessage: The password has been changed successfully.
